resources.string: Travelling in crowded metro every day?

Daily metro travel is an ordeal of sorts.And as soon as we see a miniscule of the bench peeping through the thighs of two people, we never hesitate to ask, “Can you please shift?” No one minds, or better, no one should mind. We all have the same plight; no one wants to reach office or home with aching backs and legs, a stressed out temperament and a tired mind.
